data.name: about.article
data.value: About

data.name: about.article.article_p
data.value: Lehmon Brothers is an initiative created to be something more than just a community; it was created to be a space where the bravest, sharpest lemons ready to challenge the status quo come together. Lehmon Brothers is where lemons unite to fight in an epic meme battle.

data.name: home.alert_message.text
data.value: We are updating the service and will be back soon. Thank you for your patience.

data.name: home.based_link
data.value: read why

data.name: home.based_p_1
data.value: "You will be able to reserve a maximum amount of $LEMON. 10% will be reserved after registration, 40% after inviting 5 friends, and the rest for other tasks."

data.name: home.based_p_4
data.value: %) will be reserved after registration,

data.name: home.based_p_5
data.value: % after inviting

data.name: home.based_p_6
data.value: friends, and the rest for future tasks.

data.name: home.button.getinvited
data.value: Get invited

data.name: home.button.getinvited.link
data.value: Get invited

data.name: home.h2
data.value: Secure an estimated future value of

data.name: home.h2Alt
data.value: We all know that money only has value because of a common agreement. Initiative Q is a genius way to make everyone agree on a new currency

data.name: home.how_does_it_work
data.value: Learn more

data.name: home.it_makes
data.value: How to join Lehmon Brothers

data.name: home.join_2
data.value: secure an estimated future value of

data.name: home.network
data.value: We need to find our other lemon brothers and for that, we will reserve our token for all those who join.

data.name: home.no_1
data.value: No.

data.name: home.no_2
data.value: Sounds too good to be true.

data.name: home.only_requires
data.value: Only name, email, and password are required. No spam: you will only receive updates about the system.

data.name: home.paragraphs.concept_title
data.value: A simple yet powerful concept

data.name: home.paragraphs.what_is_title
data.value: A next-generation payment system

data.name: home.point_more
data.value: Learn more

data.name: home.points.more
data.value: More

data.name: home.points.point_1
data.value: Everyone wants to be part of Lehmon Brothers, but it's not that easy; first, you need an invitation.

data.name: home.points.point_1_more_p_1
data.value: Each new brother in Lehmon Brothers has a certain amount of $LEMON Tokens that can be reserved exclusively for you, without spending anything to make the reservation. So, the earlier you join, the more $LEMON you can reserve.

data.name: home.points.point_2
data.value: The invitation is made through a brother's link; you access the link and connect your wallet.

data.name: home.points.point_2_more_p_1
data.value: The brother who owns the invitation link simply needs to approve your entry into Lehmon Brothers. Once you join, 10% of your total reserved amount is already allocated to you, and with that, we build a truly strong community.

data.name: home.points.point_3
data.value: Once you become a brother, you will also have an invitation link.

data.name: home.points.point_3_more_p_1
data.value: When you join, you get an invitation link to invite new brothers. You can approve up to 5 new brothers, so choose wisely who you will invite. By approving new brothers, you secure more $LEMON reserved for you.

data.name: home.points.point_4
data.value: The invitation period will last for a very, very limited time.

data.name: home.points.point_4_more_p_1
data.value: It will not be possible to reserve $LEMON after this period, so you need to join soon. After the invitation period, a new phase will begin: the fair distribution of $LEMON.

data.name: home.points.point_5
data.value: The fair distribution of $LEMON will ensure that the largest amount of tokens is already distributed at launch.

data.name: home.points.point_5_more_p_1
data.value: The distribution phase will be when a fundraising event takes place, with a minimum value of 20 ADA and no maximum limit. This phase is open, and anyone can participate. The percentage relative to the total ADA sent to the fundraising wallet will be the percentage of $LEMON corresponding to that phase that you will receive. Brothers who have already reserved $LEMON and participated in the fundraising will receive the amount relative to their participation in the contribution pool, plus the tokens reserved in the reservation phase.

data.name: home.points.point_6
data.value: 100% of the total ADA raised (minus fees) will go to the liquidity pool.

data.name: home.points.point_6_more_p_1
data.value: After the fundraising phase, we will distribute in liquidity pools of the top 3 Cardano DEXs, proportionally to the DEX's participation in the network.

data.name: home.points.point_7
data.value: Now the fun begins... We will build many things to make our community big, strong, and the biggest non-animal memecoin in the world.

data.name: home.points.point_7_more_p_1
data.value: Lehmon Brothers, with its $LEMON, is more than a memecoin project; it's a cultural twist. Currently, the memes on networks look like a zoo. New things will come to greatly foster the community and make $LEMON bring good lemonades.

data.name: home.possible
data.value: Learn more

data.name: home.press.h3
data.value: In the press:

data.name: home.press.quote_1
data.value: “Challenging Visa through a global currency for the future”

data.name: home.press.read
data.value: Read article

data.value: Maximum estimated amount of $LEMON for the next member:

data.value: Subtitled in Portuguese

data.value: Welcome to Initiative Q, a global effort to modernize payments!

data.name: home.what
data.value: Do you know what makes this great reward possible?

data.name: home.win.h2
data.value: Join now

data.name: home.win.win_1_h4
data.value: Free

data.name: home.win.win_1_txt
data.value: Just access with your wallet, and your $LEMONs will be reserved.

data.name: home.win.win_2_h4
data.value: Simple

data.name: home.win.win_2_txt
data.value: All you need for now is to connect your wallet.

data.name: home.win.win_3_h4
data.value: Why not?

data.name: home.win.win_3_txt
data.value: Think of it as getting bitcoin many years ago.

data.name: home.yes_1
data.value: Yes.

data.name: home.yes_2
data.value: Sign me up!

data.name: slide.tweet_text_1
data.value: This is an example of Tweet number 1

data.name: slide.tweet_text_2
data.value: This is an example of Tweet number 2

data.name: tokenization.article_p
data.value: A medium lemon can produce approximately 30-45 ml of juice.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_1
data.value: 50% of the token supply will be distributed among all pre-sale participants. Of these tokens, 50% (25% of the total - 11,250,000,000) will be made available in the reservation phase. The remaining 50% (25% of the total - 11,250,000,000) will be made available in the public pre-sale, with no prior qualifications. Distribution will be based on a snapshot of funds sent and carried out via airdrop. Pre-sale participants who have reserved tokens will receive a proportional share in the distribution, in addition to the effectively reserved tokens.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_2
data.value: 40% of the token supply will be allocated to initial liquidity, which will be distributed proportionally to participation in the SundaeSwap and Minswap networks. Liquidity Provider (LP) tokens will be stored in a multisig wallet for greater security.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_3
data.value: 6% of the token supply will be used for marketing promotions, community airdrops, events, and incentives to promote $LEMON.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_4
data.value: 3% of the token supply is reserved for exchange listings and expansion opportunities.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_5
data.value: 1% will be distributed in the first few weeks during meme battles that we will organize among our brothers.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_title_2
data.value: 40% - Initial Liquidity:

data.name: tokenization.li_span_title_3
data.value: 6% - Marketing:

data.name: tokenization.li_span_title_4
data.value: 3% - Reserve:

data.name: tokenization.li_span_title_5
data.value: 1% - Meme Battle:

data.name: tokenization.section_p_1
data.value: How is $LEMON

data.name: tokenization.section_p_2
data.value: distributed?
